title: How to Find Your Skype ID on PC or Mac

steps.title: Navigate to https://web.skype.com in a web browser.
steps.content: Navigate to https://web.skype.com in a web browser. This brings you to the Skype sign-in screen.

steps.title: Sign into Skype.
steps.content: Sign into Skype. If you’re not already signed in, enter the email address or phone number connected to your Skype account, click Next , and then enter your password to sign in.

steps.title: It’s at the top-left corner of Skype.
steps.content: It’s at the top-left corner of Skype. This displays your profile info.

steps.title: You can now copy and paste your ID anywhere.
steps.content: You can now copy and paste your ID anywhere. Depending on when and how you created your account, you may see the word “live” before your Skype ID. This is part of your Skype ID.
